title: Average YouTube video length 2018 , by category
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average length in minutes for 7 number of Youtube Categorys.
The Average length in minutes is appeared to be the highest at Youtube Category Gaming and lowest at Youtube Category Music.
There is a difference of 17.9 between the maximum Youtube Category Gaming and minimum Youtube Category Music.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Youtube Category in the x axis and Average length in minutes in the y axis.
Youtube Category Gaming has the highest Average length in minutes and Music has the lowest Average length in minutes.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average length in minutes for 7 number of Youtube Categorys.
The Average length in minutes is appeared to be the highest at Youtube Category Gaming and lowest at Youtube Category Music.
There is a difference of 17.9 between the maximum Youtube Category Gaming and minimum Youtube Category Music.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Youtube Category in the x axis and Average length in minutes in the y axis.
The Average length in minutes is highest at Youtube Category Gaming and lowest at Youtube Category Music.
The highest Youtube Category Gaming has 17.9 more Average length in minutes than the lowest Youtube Category Music.
The Youtube Category Gaming has the highest Average length in minutes, followed by Film and animation, and Entertainment. Down to the Youtube Category Music which is the lowest.
The lowest value 6.8 at Music is almost 1.86 times smaller than the average value 13.31.
The Average length in minutes is 93.2 if we add up values of all Youtube Categorys.
